about_the_game:
Szrot is a CaRPG about the underappreciated cars and cultures of Eastern Europe!

Szrot

[Szrot: Polish word for busted car or scrapyard]

In 1989 Belgrade, Yugoslavia, you're a young driver with nothing but your dad’s old Yugo and a fierce determination. Navigate the bustling cityscape, immersing yourself in underground street racing to make your mark on the world.

But life in Belgrade isn't just about racing—it's about forging connections and navigating alliances and favors. Your choices shape not only your fate but also those around you, from helping local grandmas to dealing with illicit favors.

For you and your peers, street racing isn't just a hobby—it's escapism. Each race offers a taste of freedom from societal troubles, pushing your driving skills to the limit in an adrenaline-fueled pursuit of excitement and liberation.

Customization

Szrot is a CaRPG, which means you’ll be able to customize and upgrade your car to gain an advantage in your next race or simply out-style the competition.

Side quests

Between races, you’ll meet and interact with many characters from all walks of life. From grandmas needing help with groceries to shady people looking to profit from worsening conditions. These quests will give you an insight into the everyday life of the citizens of Belgrade.

Gameplay Features

  • Racing
  • Semi-open world
  • Tune your Szrot
  • Lots of side quests
  • Many unique tracks

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
